meanings.definition: Unable to be defended or justified.
meanings.sent1: The decision to leave the door unlocked was an indefensibility mistake.
meanings.sent2: The teacher found the student's excuse for not doing homework indefensibility.
meanings.sent3: It was indefensibility funny how the cat tried to blame the broken vase on the dog.
meanings.sent4: The team's performance was an indefensibility disaster on the field.
meanings.sent5: The storm's sudden arrival left the campers in an indefensibility situation.

meanings.definition: The quality of being impossible to defend.
meanings.sent1: The indefensibility of the argument became clear during the debate.
meanings.sent2: She was frustrated by the indefensibility of her position in the conflict.
meanings.sent3: The indefensibility of the plan became evident when it started to rain.
meanings.sent4: The indefensibility of the castle walls led to its quick defeat.
meanings.sent5: The indefensibility of the theory was exposed by new scientific evidence.
